ViewFacade() - Constructor for class view.ViewFacade
Instantiates a new view facade.

W

weakness - Variable in class model.components.KillableComponent
component to wich the entity can die
WIDTHCOL - Static variable in class model.MapData
 

X

XCOL - Static variable in class model.CellData
determine the number of the column corresponding to the x in the database

Y

determine the number of the column corresponding to the Y in the database
